summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services. It details the charges incurred, including transportation charges and discounts, and specifies the payment due date. The invoice highlights Epstein's billing and shipping address in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for shipping services provided by FedEx, with his address listed in New York.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
585 Fifth Avenue 3rd FL, New York, NY 10017
keyFacts: The invoice number is 4-092-82135, dated February 4, 2002.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $25.11 after discounts.
The payment is due by February 19, 2002.
The invoice includes details of transportation charges and discounts applied.
The document contains multiple references to Jeffrey Epstein's address.
